thread.title: Equinix Earnings Jump on Stronger Business from Cloud Clients
thread.title_full: Equinix Earnings Jump on Stronger Business from Cloud Clients

title: Equinix Earnings Jump on Stronger Business from Cloud Clients
text:
Equinix Earnings Jump on Stronger Business from Cloud Clients Data center landlord projects full-year revenue up to $2.7 billion By Google+ July 29, 2015 6:38 p.m. ET 
Equinix Inc.â€™s second-quarter earnings vaulted higher as the data center landlord won more business from companies spending money to bulk up their networks. 
Earnings surged at the real-estate investment trust thanks to lower overall expenses while revenue grew 10%. The gains reflected brisk demand from corporations seeking to outsource more of their information technology resources to the cloud, a catchall term for computer work...
